senses.gloss: The quality of forming a pleasing and consistent whole.
senses.example: The colors in the painting exist in perfect harmony.

senses.gloss: Extremely distressing or disturbing; acutely painful or traumatic.
senses.example: She gave a harrowing account of her escape from the war zone.

senses.gloss: A system in which members of an organization are ranked according to relative status or authority.
senses.example: The company has a flat hierarchy with few management levels.

senses.gloss: A supposition or proposed explanation made on the basis of limited evidence as a starting point for further investigation.
senses.example: Scientists test their hypothesis through careful experimentation.
